definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: act (ruinously) corruptly (NH id. wound, injure; Ar. xabala corrupt or render unsound (the mind, a limb, etc.), xabila be deranged (in mind); As. ḫabâlu, injure, VR:62, 11; Aram. h.abel, [[חַבֵּל]] corrupt, ruin; Eth. taxabala: be arrogant, audacious; Sab. [[חַבל]] DHM:Epigr. Denkim. 48; cf. Palm. [[חבל]] mortuus Vog:No. 161 and oft.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 pl. [[חָבַלְנוּ]] Ne 1:7; Impf. 1 s. [[אֶחְבּׂל]] Job 34:31; Inf. cstr. (used as abs.) Ne 1:7; —act corruptly against, [[חֲרׂל חבלנו לְ]] Ne 1:7; abs. Job 34:31.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֵחָ֫בֶל לוֹ]] Pr 13:13 shall be ruined ([[לְ]] reflex.), Thes RobGes AV RV, but < I. [[חָבַל]] (q. v.)

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: ruin, destroy: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְחִבֵּל את מעשׂה ידיך]] Ec 5:5, subj. God. Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּחַבֵּל וְחֶבֶל נִמְרָץ]] Mic 2:10 that destroyeth, even with sore destruction; but rd. rather ´[[נ]] ´[[תְּחֻבְּלוּ ח]] ye shall be destroyed with etc., so LXX Roorda Che. Inf. cstr. [[לְחַבֵּל]] c. acc., the poor Is 32:7, the land Is 13:5; abs. Is 54:16; cf. Pt. pl. [[מְחַבְּלִים]] Ct So 2:15 c. acc. of foxes ruining vineyards.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְחֻבַּל]] consec. Is 10:27 of yoke, be ruined, broken, si vera l.; RS:JPh xiii. 1885, p. 62 prop. [[יחדל]], cf. also Che:crit. n.; and rem. by Di Du; 3 fs. [[חֻבָָּלָה]] Job 17:1 my spirit is broken (‖[[יׇמַי נִזְעָָכוּ]]); Impf. 2 mpl. [[תְּחֻבְּלוּ]] Mic 2:10 (emend.: v. supr.)
